publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-855.1 Jim Mather: The Scottish Economy-As an amendment to motion (S2M-855) in the name of Murdo Fraser, leave out from "recognises" to end and insert " welcomes growing calls for the Scottish Parliament to enjoy the full range of tax powers available to Scotland's competitors, and recognises that only with the normal economic powers of an independent parliament will the competitive conditions be created in Scotland to reverse low growth and population decline."
